Plot: After being banished from their tribe, two hunter-gatherers encounter Biblical characters and eventually wind up in the city of Sodom.
Title: Year One
Writer: Harold Ramis (screenplay), Gene Stupnitsky (screenplay), Lee Eisenberg (screenplay), Harold Ramis (story)
Actors: Jack Black, Michael Cera, Oliver Platt, David Cross
tomatoConsensus: Year One is a poorly executed, slapdash comedy in which the talent both in front of and behind the camera never seem to be on the same page.
